section.title: Using the VMware vCenter Web Interface to Configure ESXi Hosts to Enable Console Access
section.para: Configure the gdbserver ruleset on the host using the VMware vCenter web user interface.

procedure.title: To Configure VMware ESXi Hosts to Enable Console Access (Using the Web UI)

step.para: Select the ESXi host in the VMware vCenter web interface.
Click System Security Profile from the list on the left.
Select the gdbserver ruleset, and then click OK.
